data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Kibale, Uganda know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kibale, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 4,444 people in the state of Kibale who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Kibale, Uganda.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Kibale, Uganda.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Kibale, Uganda, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kibale, Uganda so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kibale, Uganda.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Kibale to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
